alert.note: Alert for Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued November 05 at 2:27AM PST until November 06 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 4 PM PST MONDAY FOR PYRAMID LAKE... * WHAT...Southwest winds 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph expected. Waves 1 to 3 feet. Highest waves from mid lake to the north and east shores. * WHERE...Pyramid Lake. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 4 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Small boats, kayaks and paddle boards will be prone to capsizing and should remain off lake waters until conditions improve.
info.instruction: Check lake conditions before heading out and be prepared for a sudden increase in winds and wave heights. Consider postponing boating activities on the lake until a day with less wind.

area.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
